ygData.subject: Re: Re: Eldritch Faction
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, ok my question now then, any necro gnomes here tried Tinkering befor say 3 patches ago ? As far as I know i could tinker then and that stupid mage in the
ygData.messageBody:
Well, ok my question now then, any necro gnomes here tried Tinkering befor
say 3 patches ago ? As far as I know i could tinker then and that stupid
mage in the 3rd Windmill did not kill me at all b4, 3 patches ago I tried
tinkering again, maken aqualungs and all of a sudden that SOB attacks me.

did any necro had that problem ? sure killen DE necros can raise my faction
but I really don't want to kill my DE faction then kill Halflings to rais
it again, this faction thing is really hard to raise if they con READY TO
ATTACK, from that to Dubiously might take like 30 hours of killing. If not
more...

50 Gnome Necro 111 tinker skill, Emarr
